student.meaningful_description: This Challenge page consists of activities, projects, and puzzlers that support Lesson 4-12, "Addition Equations." During this lesson, children will show teen numbers as a group of ten ones and extra ones and as 10 and a 1-digit number. Children will add within 6 through 10 and practice addition and subtraction fluency within 5.
student.display_title: SE: Big Idea 3 – Equations and Teen Numbers: Lesson 4-12: Addition Equations (Challenge)

student.meaningful_description: This Challenge page consists of activities, projects, and puzzlers that support Lesson 4-13, "More Partners of 10 with 5-Groups." During this lesson, children will find partners of 10 and review partners of 7, 8, and 9.
student.display_title: SE: Big Idea 3 – Equations and Teen Numbers: Lesson 4-13: More Partners of 10 with 5-Groups (Challenge)

student.meaningful_description: This Challenge page consists of activities, projects, and puzzlers that support Lesson 4-14, "Identify Cubes." During this lesson, children will describe a cube and identify relative positions of shapes.
student.display_title: SE: Big Idea 3 – Equations and Teen Numbers: Lesson 4-14: Identify Cubes (Challenge)

student.meaningful_description: This Challenge page consists of activities, projects, and puzzlers that support Lesson 4-15, "Addition and Subtraction Equations." During this lesson, children will create and solve addition and subtraction story problems and equations for numbers within 6–10 and for fluency within 5. Children will order numbers 1 through 20.
student.display_title: SE: Big Idea 3 – Equations and Teen Numbers: Lesson 4-15: Addition and Subtraction Equations (Challenge)

student.meaningful_description: This Challenge page consists of activities, projects, and puzzlers that support Lesson 4-16, "Teen Number Book." During this lesson, children will model teen numbers as a group of ten ones and extra ones and order numbers 1–19.
student.display_title: SE: Big Idea 4 – Equations for Partners: Lesson 4-16: Teen Number Book (Challenge)

student.meaningful_description: This Challenge page consists of activities, projects, and puzzlers that support Lesson 4-17, "Addition Equations." During this lesson, children will solve addition equations within 5 and explore addition strategies.
student.display_title: SE: Big Idea 4 – Equations for Partners: Lesson 4-17: Addition Equations (Challenge)

student.meaningful_description: This Challenge page consists of activities, projects, and puzzlers that support Lesson 4-18, "Partners and Equations." During this lesson, children will write equations for partners and show teen numbers as a group of 10 ones and extra ones.
student.display_title: SE: Big Idea 4 – Equations for Partners: Lesson 4-18: Partners and Equations (Challenge)

student.meaningful_description: This Challenge page consists of activities, projects, and puzzlers that support Lesson 4-19, "Write Addition Equations." During this lesson, children will find and write equations for partners and solve subtraction equations within 6 to 10.
student.display_title: SE: Big Idea 4 – Equations for Partners: Lesson 4-19: Write Addition Equations (Challenge)

student.meaningful_description: This Challenge page consists of activities, projects, and puzzlers that support Lesson 4-20, "Teen Number Book." During this lesson, children will model teen numbers as a group of ten ones and extra ones. Children match pictures to numbers, compare groups, and practice addition within 10.
student.display_title: SE: Big Idea 4 – Equations for Partners: Lesson 4-20: Teen Number Book (Challenge)

student.meaningful_description: This Challenge page consists of activities, projects, and puzzlers that support Lesson 4-21, "Identify Cones and Cylinders." During this lesson, children will describe cones and cylinders and compose three-dimensional shapes.
student.display_title: SE: Big Idea 4 – Equations for Partners: Lesson 4-21: Identify Cones and Cylinders (Challenge)

student.meaningful_description: This Challenge page consists of activities, projects, and puzzlers that support Lesson 4-22, "Focus on Mathematical Practices." During this lesson, children will use the Common Core Standards and Practices in a variety of real-world problem-solving situations.
student.display_title: SE: Big Idea 4 – Equations for Partners: Lesson 4-22: Focus on Mathematical Practices (Challenge)

student.meaningful_description: This Challenge page consists of activities, projects, and puzzlers that support Lesson 5-1, "Math Stories and Scenes with Teen Numbers." During this lesson, children will create addition and subtraction story problems. They visualize and represent teen numbers as ten ones and extra ones.
student.display_title: SE: Big Idea 1 – More Partners of 10: Lesson 5-1: Math Stories and Scenes with Teen Numbers (Challenge)

student.meaningful_description: This Challenge page consists of activities, projects, and puzzlers that support Lesson 5-2, "Partners of 10: Stars in the Night Sky." During this lesson, children will create and count stars to make partners of 10 for a classroom display and count the number of objects in a group through 20.
student.display_title: SE: Big Idea 1 – More Partners of 10: Lesson 5-2: Partners of 10: Stars in the Night Sky (Challenge)

student.meaningful_description: This Challenge page consists of activities, projects, and puzzlers that support Lesson 5-3, "More Partners of 10: Stars in the Night Sky." During this lesson, children will write equations to show partners of 10 and identify an unknown partner of 10. They count by tens to 100 and show teen numbers as a group of ten ones and extra ones.
student.display_title: SE: Big Idea 1 – More Partners of 10: Lesson 5-3: More Partners of 10: Stars in the Night Sky (Challenge)

student.meaningful_description: This Challenge page consists of activities, projects, and puzzlers that support Lesson 5-4, "Solve and Retell Story Problems." During this lesson, children will tell, retell, and solve addition and subtraction story problems with drawings and equations. They will visualize teen numbers as 10 (two 5 groups) and extra ones.
student.display_title: SE: Big Idea 1 – More Partners of 10: Lesson 5-4: Solve and Retell Story Problems (Challenge)

student.meaningful_description: This Challenge page consists of activities, projects, and puzzlers that support Lesson 5-5, "Numbers 1–100." During this lesson, children will learn to write numbers through 100, represent number 1–20 as a group of ten ones and some more ones, and practice partners for numbers 7–9.
student.display_title: SE: Big Idea 2 – Numbers 1 Through 100: Lesson 5-5: Numbers 1–100 (Challenge)

student.meaningful_description: This Challenge page consists of activities, projects, and puzzlers that support Lesson 5-6, "More Solve and Retell Story Problems." During this lesson, children will tell, retell, and write equations for addition and subtraction stories. They visualize teen numbers as ten ones and extra ones.
student.display_title: SE: Big Idea 2 – Numbers 1 Through 100: Lesson 5-6: More Solve and Retell Story Problems (Challenge)

student.meaningful_description: This Challenge page consists of activities, projects, and puzzlers that support Lesson 5-7, "Numbers 1–20." During this lesson, children will show numbers 1–20; they show the teen numbers as a group of ten ones and further ones. They find the unknown partner when the total and one partner are known.
student.display_title: SE: Big Idea 2 – Numbers 1 Through 100: Lesson 5-7: Numbers 1–20 (Challenge)

student.meaningful_description: This Challenge page consists of activities, projects, and puzzlers that support Lesson 5-8, "Review Partners." During this lesson, children will find all the partners of 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, and 10. They view teen numbers as ten ones and extra ones, and practice finding 10-partners.
student.display_title: SE: Big Idea 3 – More Teen Numbers and Partners: Lesson 5-8: Review Partners (Challenge)

student.meaningful_description: This Challenge page consists of activities, projects, and puzzlers that support Lesson 5-9, "Partners of 6, 7, 8, and 9." During this lesson, children will visualize teen numbers in sequence as ten ones and extra ones and find the unknown partner when the total and one partner are known. They identify partners of the numbers 6 through 9.
student.display_title: SE: Big Idea 3 – More Teen Numbers and Partners: Lesson 5-9: Partners of 6, 7, 8, and 9 (Challenge)

student.meaningful_description: This Challenge page consists of activities, projects, and puzzlers that support Lesson 5-10, "Tens in Teen Numbers: A Game." During this lesson, children will solve addition and subtraction story problems and visualize teen numbers as ten ones and extra ones. They will use the = and ≠ signs in comparing.
student.display_title: SE: Big Idea 3 – More Teen Numbers and Partners: Lesson 5-10: Tens in Teen Numbers: A Game (Challenge)

student.meaningful_description: This Challenge page consists of activities, projects, and puzzlers that support Lesson 5-11, "Tens in Teen Numbers Book." During this lesson, children will visualize teen numbers as ten ones and extra ones and find 10-partners.
student.display_title: SE: Big Idea 3 – More Teen Numbers and Partners: Lesson 5-11: Tens in Teen Numbers Book (Challenge)

student.meaningful_description: This Challenge page consists of activities, projects, and puzzlers that support Lesson 5-12, "Partners of 10: Class Project." During this lesson, children will relate 10-partner drawings to addition equations and find changes in the partners of ten.
student.display_title: SE: Big Idea 3 – More Teen Numbers and Partners: Lesson 5-12: Partners of 10: Class Project (Challenge)

student.meaningful_description: This Challenge page consists of activities, projects, and puzzlers that support Lesson 5-13, "Introduction to Counting and Grouping Routines." During this lesson, children will count by ones and tens to 100. They find partners of 10 and write and discuss 7-partners.
student.display_title: SE: Big Idea 3 – More Teen Numbers and Partners: Lesson 5-13: Introduction to Counting and Grouping Routines (Challenge)

student.meaningful_description: This Challenge page consists of activities, projects, and puzzlers that support Lesson 5-14, "Practice: Number Activities." During this lesson, children will equalize groups by adding and find partners of 7, 8, and 9.
student.display_title: SE: Big Idea 3 – More Teen Numbers and Partners: Lesson 5-14: Practice: Number Activities (Challenge)

student.meaningful_description: This Challenge page consists of activities, projects, and puzzlers that support Lesson 5-15, "Add Partners to Find Totals." During this lesson, children will show numbers 1–20, show the teen numbers as a group of ten ones and further ones. They find the unknown partner when the total and one partner are known and find the total of the two partners.
student.display_title: SE: Big Idea 4 – More Story Problems and Equations: Lesson 5-15: Add Partners to Find Totals (Challenge)

student.meaningful_description: This Challenge page consists of activities, projects, and puzzlers that support Lesson 5-16, "Story Problems and Comparing: Totals Through 10." During this lesson, children will tell, retell, and solve addition and subtraction stories. They also compare the number of objects in two groups and take away objects to make groups equal.
student.display_title: SE: Big Idea 4 – More Story Problems and Equations: Lesson 5-16: Story Problems and Comparing: Totals Through 10 (Challenge)

student.meaningful_description: This Challenge page consists of activities, projects, and puzzlers that support Lesson 5-17, "Subtract to Make Equal Groups." During this lesson, children will visualize teen numbers as ten ones and further ones. They compare the number of objects in groups and compare numbers.
student.display_title: SE: Big Idea 4 – More Story Problems and Equations: Lesson 5-17: Subtract to Make Equal Groups (Challenge)

student.meaningful_description: This Challenge page consists of activities, projects, and puzzlers that support Lesson 5-18, "Tens and Ones." During this lesson, children will visualize teen numbers as a group of ten ones and further ones.
student.display_title: SE: Big Idea 4 – More Story Problems and Equations: Lesson 5-18: Tens and Ones (Challenge)

student.meaningful_description: This Challenge page consists of activities, projects, and puzzlers that support Lesson 5-19, "Teen Numbers, Partners, and Equations." During this lesson, children will tell, retell, and solve addition and subtraction stories. They show teen numbers as a group of ten ones and further ones.
student.display_title: SE: Big Idea 4 – More Story Problems and Equations: Lesson 5-19: Teen Numbers, Partners, and Equations (Challenge)

student.meaningful_description: This Challenge page consists of activities, projects, and puzzlers that support Lesson 5-20, "More Tens in Teen Numbers: A Game." During this lesson, children will compare the number of objects in groups and compare numbers. They visualize teen numbers as ten ones and further ones.
student.display_title: SE: Big Idea 4 – More Story Problems and Equations: Lesson 5-20: More Tens in Teen Numbers: A Game (Challenge)

student.meaningful_description: This Challenge page consists of activities, projects, and puzzlers that support Lesson 5-21, "Compare Length and Compare Height." During this lesson, children will compare two objects and identify which is longer or shorter. They compare two objects to identify which is taller or shorter.
student.display_title: SE: Big Idea 4 – More Story Problems and Equations: Lesson 5-21: Compare Length and Compare Height (Challenge)

student.meaningful_description: This Challenge page consists of activities, projects, and puzzlers that support Lesson 5-22, "Compare Weight and Compare Capacity." During this lesson, children will compare two objects and identify which is heavier and lighter. They compare two containers and identify which has more or less capacity.

student.meaningful_description: This Challenge page consists of activities, projects, and puzzlers that support Lesson 5-23, "Focus on Mathematical Practices." During this lesson, children will apply mathematical concepts and skills in a meaningful real-world context.
